forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 48F. NNW winds shifting to E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning, then partly cloudy and windy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning, then partly cloudy and windy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 61F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Gusty winds early. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 19C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. Becoming windy late. High 66F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 20C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 68F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 51F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 24C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 75F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 23C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 73F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 21C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 69F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low around 50F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 50F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
